org.openimaj.vis.general

Class AxesRenderer3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.vis.general.AxesRenderer3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataUnitsTransformer<float[],double[],double[]>

    public class AxesRenderer3D
extends Object
implements DataUnitsTransformer<float[],double[],double[]>
    A class for generating X, Y and Z axes in a 3D visualisation and providing data unit transformations. // TODO: Need to add getters/setters ***
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
